text: Zai yu tamen jiaojie zhiqian, zai wei tamen jueding pin yi zhihou, ruguo nimen xiule tamen, name, yingdang yi suoding pin yi de banshu zengyu tamen, chufei tamen jiayi kuan mian, huo shou di hunyue de ren jiayi kuan mian; kuan mian shi geng jin yu jingwei de. Nimen buyao wangji huhui. Zhenzhu que shi mingcha nimen de xingwei de
